titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Environmental Protection Agency, Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Environmental Protection Agency, Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Manufacturing, and Critical Materials.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund.
